meaning_en: to become gradually damaged, worse, or less;
example: Floating in the dirty river were dead fish, already starting to decay.

meaning_en: behaviour that is good, moral, and acceptable in society
example: She didn't even have the decency to apologize

meaning_en: the act of being friendly and welcoming to guests and visitors
example: The local people showed me great hospitality.
The swinging door bashed him in the face.
Cars were zooming [=speeding] down the highway.

meaning_en: to have someone's attention completely so that they cannot think of anything else
example: I was completely mesmerized by the performance.
